column4: I am confused - if I want to change the looks of folders and other icons in ubuntu, and I am using the emerald window decorator with compiz-fusion, should I be looking for some kind of emerald theme, or am I suppose to get a metacity theme to change that stuff?
so emerald themes will also change the appearance of file folders and other icons (assuming that is part of the custom theme) ?
sarai, yeah... I'm perusing that site... it's just very confusing with all these different theme types, and window managers and window decorators and this and that, hehe
try ubuntu ultimate edition or download the deb file from gnome look its 400MB but its f*** good
